name: Paradox Wrench
description: Paradox Wrench is a first person puzzle game. You have agreed to be part of an undisclosed experiment. You will be equipped with a special weapon-like tool. This tool has the ability to switch the physical dimension of certain objects, as well as your own.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB DX9 (shader model 2.0) Storage: 110 MB available space
